title: ModuleGroup schema
description: Specifies a group of libnoise and Wangscape modules with output and possible inputs.

defaultoutputmodule.title: ModuleGroup defaultoutputmodule schema
defaultoutputmodule.description: Specifies which of the keys in 'modules' contains the module which should be used for the module group's output.

inputmodules.title: ModuleGroup inputmodules schema
inputmodules.description: Specifies which of the keys in Modules, if any, contain modules which should be used to relay the module group's external input modules.

items.title: Specifies a key in Modules which contains a module that should be used to relay one of the module group's external input modules. The module referred to must be of a type with at least one source module, and only the first will be used.

modules.title: ModuleGroup modules schema
modules.description: Specifies the names, types, and attributes of a group of libnoise and Wangscape modules.

oneOf.title: Module SourceModule schema
oneOf.description: Specifies which of the keys in this module group contains the module that should be used as this module's source module.

oneOf.title: Module SourceModules schema
oneOf.description: Specifies an array of keys in this module group which contain the modules that should be used as this module's source modules.

items.title: Module SourceModules item schema
items.description: Specifies a key in this module group which contains a module that should be used as one of this module's source modules.

source_module_2.title: Module SourceModules schema
source_module_2.description: Specifies an array of keys in this module group which contain the modules that should be used as this module's source modules.

items.title: Module SourceModules item schema
items.description: Specifies a key in this module group which contains a module that should be used as one of this module's source modules.

abs.title: Abs module schema
abs.description: Specifies an Abs module and its attributes.

type.title: Module type schema
type.description: Specifies that this module is of type Abs.

add.title: Add module schema
add.description: Specifies an Add module and its attributes.

type.title: Module type schema
type.description: Specifies that this module is of type Add.

billow.description: Specifies a Billow module and its attributes.

type.title: Module type schema

Frequency.title: Billow module Frequency schema
Frequency.description: Specifies the value of Frequency used in this Billow module.

Lacunarity.title: Billow module Lacunarity schema
Lacunarity.description: Specifies the value of Lacunarity used in this Billow module.

Persistence.title: Billow module Persistence schema
Persistence.description: Specifies the value of Persistence used in this Billow module.

OctaveCount.title: Billow module OctaveCount schema
OctaveCount.description: Specifies the value of OctaveCount used in this Billow module.

Seed.title: Billow module Seed schema
Seed.description: Specifies the value of Seed used in this Billow module.
